items.sentence: Someone left a burning cigarette on the table.
Something funny happened to me on my way home.
Stop taking pictures. You look like a tourist.
Talk to Tom and see what he thinks about this.
I didn\'t know what we were doing was illegal.
I didn\'t mean to interrupt your conversation.
I didn\'t notice whether Tom was there or not.
Why don\'t you try to behave like a gentleman?
Can you tell me more about the person you saw?
Tom knew that Mary didn\'t want to drink beer.
